meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bridget Ker Sawyer Morgan Jess Lindoerfer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7107.

td.p: Bridget Ker, a museum professional from Hamilton, Ontario, Canada
Sawyer Morgan, an engineering student originally from Fishers, Indiana
Jess Lindoerfer, a study-abroad program manager from Putney, Vermont (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,801)

tr.td: COMIC-CON
(Alex: Now, Comic-Con opens, of course, later this week here in Southern California.)
1990s BESTSELLERS
A SPEECH TO CONGRESS
CROCODILE
DONE "D"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin--and, as a matter of fact, will end--with that letter.)
(Alex: And finally--what did he say in the movie?...)
YOU CALL THAT A KNIFE?

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '[The end-of-round signal sounds.]

San Diego

Sawyer
')

(Alex: Okay, good. Maybe we won\'t pursue that.)
SawyerWhat is the Tour de France?
$3,990
JessWhat is the Busch
$6,801

$6,601
the Tour de France')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
